1291260.name: Night Spasm Chapter 1 Soundtrack (Ver 1.1)
1291260.description:
The Night Spasm Chapter 1 Soundtrack IS HERE!

Listen to your favorite Night Spasm tracks all within a single download! Whether you're listening to our banger tunes for fun, looking to add our soundtrack to a video, or collecting music bits for an awesome remix, experience the goosebump-inducing soundtrack of Night Spasm whenever you like! It's truly the best way to enjoy Night Spasm's quirky character themes, intimidating battle scores, and soothing piano pieces, all for FREE!

Soundtrack version: 1.1

All music tracks accessible from Chapter 1 are included in this pack. Any new future tracks featured in Chapter 1 will be included here as well. Keep an eye out for game and soundtrack announcements!

THANK YOU FOR CHECKING OUT THE NIGHT SPASM SOUNDTRACK PAGE!
